metadata.title: CVE-2017-5898 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the emulated_apdu_from_guest function in usb/dev-smartcard-reader.c in Quick Emulator (Qemu), when built with the CCID Card device emulator support, allows local users to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a large Application Protocol Data Units (APDU) unit.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.8+dfsg-3ubuntu2').
